title: Sister Generator
original_name: シスタージェネレーター 沙村広明短編集
sinopse:
1. Kuzein-ke Saidai no Show (The Biggest Show of the Kuzein Family)
   2-4. Seifuku wa Nugenai #1~3 (Can't Take Off My Uniform)
2. Brigit no Bansan (Brigit's Supper)
   6-8. Seifuku wa Nugenai #4~6
3. Shizuru Cinema (Shizuru Film)
4. Kasou Senryaku Kagami-uchi (Lower Class Tactic: Mirror Strike)
   11-12. Seifuku wa Nugenai #7~8
5. Seishun Janjaka Jaka Jaka
6. Emerald
